name: Spirit Gorgons . Awakening in the Sands
description:
Against the backdrop of ancient stones and endless sand,
she moves with grace — a silhouette in a flowing black mantle,
lifted and shaped by the whispering wind.
Her pose speaks of strength reborn and secrets yet to be revealed,
caught in a timeless ritual of earth and air.
This unique 1/1 NFT from the “Rebirth of the Gorgona” series invites you to witness her quiet awakening.
